ours.controller

Class StaffAdminScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ours.controller.StaffAdminScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class StaffAdminScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controls the staff admin screen where staff can add, edit, and view departmental classes
